name: Salem (dduckyyy)
description:
Our game revolves around 10 year old Salem as he explores his home and uncovers the strange secrets of his home, starting with his basement. 

The story has a focus on trauma and the lens a child has when experiencing and interpreting traumatic experiences.  

Since this experience is supposed to reflect the feeling of a person looking in our target demographic is young adults and those who can empathize with Salem.

Our final product ended up being a vertical slice of what could be a much more expansive game, exploring more of Salem's house.
